mapper.select: select distinct bi.MONTH_MTH_START_DATE,bi.MONTH_END_DATE,dg.TIME_ID,bimf.ENROL_ID,bimf.ENROL_NAME,dg.ROW1,dg.ROW2,dg.ORG_ID,bitu.ORG_NAME,bitu.ORG_AREACODE,bimf.AREA_NAME from GYJCDG.M_FINANCIAL_CONDITION dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.T_UUMS_BASE_ORG bitu on dg.org_id=bitu.org_id left join GYJCBI.M_FINANCIAL_CONDITION_DIM bimf on dg.dim_id=bimf.enrol_id left join GYJCDG.PROJECT_AREA_DIM bimf on dg.area_id=bimf.area_id

select distinct * from GYJCDG.MO_DIV_INDUS_MAIN_FINANC dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.MO_DIV_INDUS_MAIN_FINANC_DIM bimf on dg.DIM_ID=bimf.ENROL_ID WHERE ENROL_ID!='047' AND ENROL_ID!='048' AND (ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL OR ROW5 IS NOT NULL OR ROW6 IS NOT NULL OR ROW7 IS NOT NULL OR ROW8 IS NOT NULL OR ROW9 IS NOT NULL OR ROW10 IS NOT NULL OR ROW11 IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY dg.TIME_ID,bi.month_id,dg.DIM_ID

select distinct dg.*,bi.*,bimf.ENROL_NAME from GYJCDG.M_DIVINDUS_OUTPRICE_INDEX dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.M_DIVINDUS_OUTPRICE_INDEX_DIM bimf on dg.ENROL_ID=bimf.ENROL_ID WHERE ROW1 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY dg.TIME_ID,bi.month_id,dg.ENROL_ID

select distinct dg.*,bi.*,bimf.DIM_NAME from GYJCDG.M_SOCIAL_POWER_CLASSIFICA dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.M_SOCIAL_POWER_CLASSIFICA_DIM bimf on dg.DIM_ID=bimf.DIM_ID WHERE DIM_ID >= 17 AND DIM_ID <= 71 ORDER BY dg.TIME_ID

select distinct * from GYJCDG.MO_CHINA_PMI_INDEX dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.MO_CHINA_PMI_INDEX_DIM bimf on dg.DIM_ID=bimf.enrol_id ORDER BY dg.TIME_ID,dg.DIM_ID

select distinct dg.*,bi.*,bimf.ENROL_ID,bimf.ENROL_NAME,bimf.ORG_ID from GYJCDG.MO_ZD_IND_PARK_MAIN_INDEX dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.MO_ZD_IND_PARK_MAIN_INDEX_DIM bimf on dg.calling_id=bimf.enrol_id ORDER BY dg.TIME_ID,dg.calling_id

select distinct bi.MONTH_MTH_START_DATE,bi.MONTH_END_DATE,dg.TIME_ID,bimf.ENROL_ID,bimf.ENROL_NAME,dg.ROW1,dg.ROW2,dg.ROW3,dg.ROW4,dg.ORG_ID,bitu.ORG_NAME,dg.AREA_ID,bimf.AREA_NAME from GYJCDG.M_INDUS_SALES_MAJOR_PROD dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCDG.PROJECT_AREA_DIM bimf on dg.area_id=bimf.area_id left join GYJCBI.M_INDUS_SALES_MAJOR_PROD_DIM bimf on SUBSTR(dg.dim_id, 1, 3)=bimf.enrol_id left join GYJCBI.T_UUMS_BASE_ORG bitu on dg.org_id=bitu.org_id where (dg.row1 is not null or dg.row2 is not null or dg.row3 is not null or dg.row4 is not null)

select distinct dg.*,bitu.ORG_NAME,bimf.AREA_NAME,bi.MONTH_MTH_START_DATE,bi.MONTH_END_DATE from GYJCDG.M_INDUS_PROD_SALE_INV_ORD dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCDG.PROJECT_AREA_DIM bimf on dg.area_id=bimf.area_id left join GYJCBI.T_UUMS_BASE_ORG bitu on dg.org_id=bitu.org_id

select distinct dg.*,bi.*,bimf.DIM_NAME from GYJCDG.M_JX_PROVINCE_MAIN_INDEX dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.M_JX_PROVINCE_MAIN_INDEX_DIM bimf on dg.dim_id=bimf.dim_id WHERE (dg.ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR dg.ROW2 IS NOT NULL)

select distinct dg.*,bitu.ORG_NAME,bimf.AREA_NAME,bimf.ENROL_ID,bimf.ENROL_NAME,bi.MONTH_MTH_START_DATE,bi.MONTH_END_DATE from GYJCDG.M_PARK_QY_MAIN_INDEX dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCDG.PROJECT_AREA_DIM bimf on dg.area_id=bimf.area_id left join GYJCBI.M_PARK_QY_MAIN_INDEX_DIM bimf on dg.dim_id=bimf.enrol_id left join GYJCBI.T_UUMS_BASE_ORG bitu on dg.org_id=bitu.org_id WHERE dg.ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR dg.ROW2 IS NOT NULL

select distinct dg.*,bi.*,bimf.DIM_NAME from GYJCDG.M_ALL_THE_CITY_MAIN_INDEX dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.M_ALL_THE_CITY_MAIN_INDEX_DIM bimf on dg.dim_id=bimf.dim_id WHERE ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL OR ROW5 IS NOT NULL OR ROW6 IS NOT NULL OR ROW7 IS NOT NULL OR ROW8 IS NOT NULL OR ROW9 IS NOT NULL OR ROW10 IS NOT NULL OR ROW11 IS NOT NULL OR ROW12 IS NOT NULL OR ROW13 IS NOT NULL OR ROW14 IS NOT NULL OR ROW15 IS NOT NULL OR ROW16 IS NOT NULL OR ROW17 IS NOT NULL OR ROW18 IS NOT NULL OR ROW19 IS NOT NULL OR ROW20 IS NOT NULL

select distinct * from GYJCDG.MO_INDUS_MAIN_FINANCIAL dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.MO_INDUS_MAIN_FINANCIAL_DIM bimf on dg.calling_id=bimf.enrol_id where ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL OR ROW5 IS NOT NULL OR ROW6 IS NOT NULL OR ROW7 IS NOT NULL OR ROW8 IS NOT NULL OR ROW9 IS NOT NULL OR ROW10 IS NOT NULL OR ROW11 IS NOT NULL OR ROW12 IS NOT NULL OR ROW13 IS NOT NULL OR ROW14 IS NOT NULL OR ROW15 IS NOT NULL OR ROW16 IS NOT NULL OR ROW17 IS NOT NULL OR ROW18 IS NOT NULL OR ROW19 IS NOT NULL OR ROW20 IS NOT NULL OR ROW21 IS NOT NULL OR ROW22 IS NOT NULL OR ROW23 IS NOT NULL OR ROW24 IS NOT NULL OR ROW25 IS NOT NULL OR ROW26 IS NOT NULL OR ROW27 IS NOT NULL OR ROW28 IS NOT NULL OR ROW29 IS NOT NULL

select distinct * from GYJCDG.MO_INDUS_PARK_MAIN_INDEX dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.MO_INDUS_PARK_MAIN_INDEX_DIM bimf on dg.calling_id=bimf.enrol_id where ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL

select distinct * from GYJCDG.MO_INDUS_VALUES_ADDED dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.MO_INDUS_VALUES_ADDED_DIM bimf on dg.calling_id=bimf.enrol_id where ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL

select distinct * from GYJCDG.MO_INDUS_MAIN_PROD_OUTPUT dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.MO_INDUS_MAIN_PROD_OUTPUT_DIM bimf on dg.calling_id=bimf.enrol_id where ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL

select distinct * from GYJCDG.MO_INDUS_MAIN_ECON_INDEX dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCBI.MO_INDUS_MAIN_ECON_INDEX_DIM bimf on dg.calling_id=bimf.enrol_id where ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL OR ROW5 IS NOT NULL OR ROW6 IS NOT NULL OR ROW7 IS NOT NULL OR ROW8 IS NOT NULL

select distinct dg.*,bi.*,bimf.AREA_NAME from GYJCDG.MO_NATION_INDUS_ADD_VALUE dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id left join GYJCDG.PROJECT_AREA_DIM bimf on dg.area_id=bimf.area_id WHERE dg.calling_id='019' and (ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL)

select distinct * from GYJCDG.MO_NATION_INDUS_ADD_SALES dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id WHERE dg.calling_id='019' and (ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL)

select distinct * from GYJCDG.M_NATION_INDUS_VALUE_N_SALES dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id WHERE dg.dim_id='360000' and (ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL OR ROW5 IS NOT NULL OR ROW6 IS NOT NULL OR ROW7 IS NOT NULL OR ROW8 IS NOT NULL OR ROW9 IS NOT NULL OR ROW10 IS NOT NULL OR ROW11 IS NOT NULL OR ROW12 IS NOT NULL OR ROW13 IS NOT NULL OR ROW14 IS NOT NULL OR ROW15 IS NOT NULL OR ROW16 IS NOT NULL OR ROW17 IS NOT NULL OR ROW18 IS NOT NULL OR ROW19 IS NOT NULL OR ROW20 IS NOT NULL)

select distinct * from GYJCDG.M_NATION_MAIN_PROD_CASE1 dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id WHERE dg.dim_id='360000' AND (ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL OR ROW5 IS NOT NULL OR ROW6 IS NOT NULL OR ROW7 IS NOT NULL OR ROW8 IS NOT NULL OR ROW9 IS NOT NULL OR ROW10 IS NOT NULL OR ROW11 IS NOT NULL OR ROW12 IS NOT NULL OR ROW13 IS NOT NULL OR ROW14 IS NOT NULL OR ROW15 IS NOT NULL OR ROW16 IS NOT NULL OR ROW17 IS NOT NULL OR ROW18 IS NOT NULL OR ROW19 IS NOT NULL OR ROW20 IS NOT NULL)

select distinct * from GYJCDG.M_NATION_MAIN_PROD_CASE2 dg left join GYJCBI.PUBLIC_TIME_DIM bi on dg.time_id=bi.month_id WHERE dg.dim_id='360000' AND (ROW3 IS NOT NULL OR ROW1 IS NOT NULL OR ROW2 IS NOT NULL OR ROW4 IS NOT NULL OR ROW5 IS NOT NULL OR ROW6 IS NOT NULL OR ROW7 IS NOT NULL OR ROW8 IS NOT NULL OR ROW9 IS NOT NULL OR ROW10 IS NOT NULL OR ROW11 IS NOT NULL OR ROW12 IS NOT NULL OR ROW13 IS NOT NULL OR ROW14 IS NOT NULL OR ROW15 IS NOT NULL OR ROW16 IS NOT NULL OR ROW17 IS NOT NULL OR ROW18 IS NOT NULL OR ROW19 IS NOT NULL OR ROW20 IS NOT NULL)
